Reserve a Spot
Partner with us

Our Speakers are massively-creative innovators who leverage the MLDS platform to present mind-expanding ideas that are re-shaping today’s world and tomorrow’s universe.

MLDS 2025

Spanning the many tracks and themes of the MLDS, our Speakers offer attendees the knowledge, leadership and inspiration to shape their professional careers and personal lives in our ever-evolving path forward.

Explore the full list of Featured Speakers and Featured Sessions below. Stay tuned for more programing announcements throughout the season.

our Speakers

We are in the process of finalizing the speakers for 2025. Please check back this space again.
Expect more than 100 speakers to speak at MLDS 2025

To explore speaking opportunities with MLDS, write to info@aimmediahouse.com

Kumar Varun to perfom at MLDS 2025

Kumar Varun is an Indian stand-up comedian, actor, writer and quizmaster. He is known for his roles in the comedy sketches of All India Bakchod, as the co-founder of the comedy collective Random Chikibum, which won the OML Comedy Hunt. 

Our Past Speakers

Speakers 2024
Speakers 2023
Speakers 2022
Speakers 2021
Speakers 2020
Speakers 2019

Grab your ticket for a unique experience of inspiration, meeting and networking with Top developers in India.

Book your tickets at the earliest. We have a hard stop at 1000 passes.

Note: Ticket Pricing to change at any time.

  • 1 Day Pass

  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for 1 Day
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹7000
Recommended

  • Full Access Passes

    All Access 3 Day Pass
  • Access to all in-person tracks & workshops
  • Access the recorded sessions later
  • Access to in-person networking with attendees & speakers
  • Conference Lunch for all 3 days
  • No Group Discount Available
  • ₹15000

Our past Sponsors

To know more details, write to info@aimmediahouse.com

Partner with us

40 under 40 data scientists awards

40Under40 is an attempt towards recognizing the leading data scientists in India who have successfully transformed data into meaningful insights.

2025 nominations are OPEN.

More Details

India's Biggest developers Conference

call for papers

MLDS will include additional programs for technical paper presentations.

The submissions for 2025 are open.

More Details
It’s wrap from #mlds2023 A #greatopportunity to interact with brightest minds in data science, looking forward to stay in touch with you all

MS Hussain

UnitedHealth group

Thats an end of amazing Machine Learning Developer Summit by Analytics India Magazine I had an opportunity to attend excellent session, with deep insight on some topic and opportunity to talk with industry experts

Sanjay Lalwani

Siemens

Enhancing experience, gaining knowledge about Machine Learning at #mlds2023

Aakash Kathuria

Lenskart

I will be at India’s Biggest Machine Learning Developers Summit #MLDS2023. Join me for an engaging session on our journey in an #AI First world and how you could leverage our learnings for your organisations success too.

Rajat Pandit

Google

“Predicting the future isn’t magic, it’s artificial intelligence.”

~Dave Waters
